title: Consumer spending on mobile games in the U.S. 2014 to 2016
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average expenditure in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 3.
Overall Average expenditure in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average expenditure in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Average expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 77.6 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest Average expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 60.95 was reported at Year 2014
